about.title: Tentang saya
about.intro: Hallo ! I'm Wahyudin, Software developer based in Jakarta (Indonesia). I'm a man who thirsts for curiosity and problem solvers in third of night. I am very passionate and dedicated to my work. And enjoy working in a team or individual.
